mapper.update:
update wx_spring_activity
wx_act_lucky_wheel_id = #{wxActLuckyWheelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
film_toal_num = #{filmToalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
film_use_num = #{filmUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
film_remain_num = #{filmRemainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_day_num = #{redPacketDayNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_num = #{redPacketNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_remain_num = #{redPacketRemainNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_max_amount = #{redPacketMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_min_amount = #{redPacketMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_year_eve_red_packet_max_amount = #{newYearEveRedPacketMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_year_eve_red_packet_min_amount = #{newYearEveRedPacketMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wx_spring_activity set wx_act_lucky_wheel_id = #{wxActLuckyWheelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, film_toal_num = #{filmToalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, film_use_num = #{filmUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, film_remain_num = #{filmRemainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red_packet_day_num = #{redPacketDayNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, red_packet_num = #{redPacketNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, red_packet_remain_num = #{redPacketRemainNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, red_packet_max_amount = #{redPacketMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, red_packet_min_amount = #{redPacketMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_year_eve_red_packet_max_amount = #{newYearEveRedPacketMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_year_eve_red_packet_min_amount = #{newYearEveRedPacketMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT walw.begin_time AS beginDate, walw.end_time AS endDate FROM wx_spring_activity wsa LEFT JOIN wx_act_lucky_wheel walw ON wsa.wx_act_lucky_wheel_id = walw.id WHERE wsa.id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND wsa.is_deleted = 0 AND walw.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_spring_activity SET red_packet_remain_num = (red_packet_remain_num - #{redPacketRemainNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND is_deleted = 0 and red_packet_remain_num = #{preRedPacketRemainNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
